testsuite.class: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 3 out of 4 - step workFlow tests
Below test cases were added for PIPE-3850

testcase.class: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 3 out of 4 - step workFlow tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3850 S-WF-021. User verifies that if there are steps grouped in an affinity group in a pipeline which run on linux node, and one of the steps has a dependency outside the affinity group, which get failed, all the next steps in the group should get skipped.
testcase.classclass: S-WF-021. User verifies that if there are steps grouped in an affinity group in a pipeline which run on linux node, and one of the steps has a dependency outside the affinity group, which get failed, all the next steps in the group should get skipped.

testcase.class: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 3 out of 4 - step workFlow tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3850 S-WF-022. User verifies that the steps in a pipeline that run on linux node, do not run if their parent step(s) is/are failed and they should get skipped.
testcase.classclass: S-WF-022. User verifies that the steps in a pipeline that run on linux node, do not run if their parent step(s) is/are failed and they should get skipped.

testcase.class: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 3 out of 4 - step workFlow tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3850 S-WF-023. User verifies that In a pipeline, If there is a resource between two steps, the second step should not get executed when the step which produces the resource is not successful on linux node.
testcase.classclass: S-WF-023. User verifies that In a pipeline, If there is a resource between two steps, the second step should not get executed when the step which produces the resource is not successful on linux node.

testcase.class: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 3 out of 4 - step workFlow tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3850 S-WF-024. User verifies that if there are steps grouped in an affinity group in a pipeline which run on linux node, should get queued only when their input dependencies are successfully executed.
testcase.classclass: S-WF-024. User verifies that if there are steps grouped in an affinity group in a pipeline which run on linux node, should get queued only when their input dependencies are successfully executed.

testcase.class: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 3 out of 4 - step workFlow tests Below test cases were added for PIPE-3850 S-WF-025. User verifies that all the steps in a pipeline which runs on a windows node, will get executed in the right order.
testcase.classclass: S-WF-025. User verifies that all the steps in a pipeline which runs on a windows node, will get executed in the right order.
